albums.title: Kissland
albums.description: After his monumental mixtape, 'Trilogy', The Weeknd releases his first offical album in 2014

albums.title: Silver Linings
albums.description: The first EP after numerous singles, and a mixtape that put him on the map. Silver Linings features everything you love about Leo.

albums.title: Both Sides
albums.description: With is 2nd studio album, Collins creates another masterpiece featuring the styles you come to love about this artist.

albums.title: The Inspiration
albums.description: With his second album, Jeezy asserts himself as one of the best hip hop artists out now with the new classic.

albums.title: Call Me Over
albums.description: The Toronto duo's first EP features 3 songs that ecompasses everything you come to love about AN.
